title: Dark Wish
description: I told him my deepest, darkest secret.And in turn, he made my wish come true.She's the shy girl.The one you'd never notice.But I did.I watched her, studied her.While she worked in the library, meticulously rearranging books as though she'd written them herself.I wanted her... so I made her an offer she couldnâ€™t refuse.Tell me your deepest, darkest wish...And I will make it come true.One whisper ...One single wish ...And I bought her soul.
author: Clarissa Wild
